author: Pia Ceres
title: With Kids Stuck at Home, Authors Bring Stories to Instagram
description: As schools close, parents are turning to children’s book writers and illustrators on social media to help with teaching kids stuck inside.
content: Pure, distilled joy is hard to come by these days. But if you logged onto Instagram at around 2pm ET last week, you might have spotted childrens book author and illustrator Oliver Jeffers reading one of his books live to his 267,000 followers. If you were luc… [+4591 chars]
